name: 默认模板
description: 基于 MD 默认主题（经典主题）转换而来

h1.base: display: table; padding: 0 1em; border-bottom: 2px solid #576b95; margin: 2em auto 1em; color: #24292e; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

h2.base: display: table; padding: 0 0.2em; margin: 4em auto 2em; color: #fff; background: #576b95; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

h3.base: padding-left: 8px; border-left: 3px solid #576b95; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; color: #24292e; font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.2;

list.item: display: block; margin: 0.2em 8px; color: #24292e; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.8;
list.taskList: display: block; margin: 0.2em 8px; color: #24292e; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.8; list-style: none;

code.block: font-size: 90%; overflow-x: auto; border-radius: 8px; padding: 1em; line-height: 1.5; margin: 10px 8px; color: #24292e; background: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #e1e4e8;
code.inline: font-size: 90%; color: #d14; background: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); padding: 3px 5px; border-radius: 4px;

styles.quote: font-style: normal; padding: 1em; border-left: 4px solid #576b95; border-radius: 6px; color: #24292e; background: #f6f8fa; margin: 1em 0;
styles.image: display: block; max-width: 100%; margin: 0.1em auto 0.5em; border-radius: 4px;

table.header: font-weight: bold; color: #24292e; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; padding: 0.25em 0.5em; word-break: keep-all; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); font-size: 1em;
table.cell: border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; padding: 0.25em 0.5em; color: #24292e; word-break: keep-all; font-size: 1em;

styles.hr: border-style: solid; border-width: 2px 0 0; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); height: 0.4em; margin: 1.5em 0;
